XIII.ii.2.D.1.c
.
Veteran Inquiries Concerning Information VA Provided to OPM
If the Veteranâ€™s application for government employment is disapproved based on information VA provided regarding his/her medical condition(s), and he/she sends an inquiry regarding the disapproval to OPM, OPM may forward the inquiry to VA for a response.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D - Information Sharing With the Office of Personnel Management (OPM)
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D
